event.desc: Upgrade your Energy storage with this rare item!

event.name: New Adventurer Bundle
event.desc: Welcome to the world of Spellstone! I've procured a one-time bundle to help start your journey!

event.name: Gold Premium Card
event.desc: Gives one copy of a ^cE7FFWendigo^cFFFF! May be purchased unlimited times.

event.name: Guild Clash Practice
event.desc: Practice for the Guild Clash! Same battleground conditions as Guild Clash including current active global effects. All attacks are available for the start!

event_reward.desc: Complete the Challenge at Rank 1 or higher.
Complete the Challenge at Rank 20000 or higher.

event.name: Spellstone's 8th Anniversary
event.desc: A limited time campaign in Conflux Convergence to celebrate our 8th Anniversary!

event.name: Halloween Trick or Treat
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Pharos Temple! It promises a special treat but will there be a spooky ending?

event.name: Happy Holidays from ComDev
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Golden Crown Village! Have an Epic Spellstone Xmas!

event.name: Valentine Event Node
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Gladius Arena! From a secret admirer!

event.name: April Fool's!
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Red Feather Valley! No statements are to be taken as serious intention from ComDev!

event.name: ComDev Anniversary
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Red Feather Valley! Looking back at 12 months of ComDev

event.name: Spellstone's 9th Anniversary
event.desc: A limited time campaign in Red Feather Valley to celebrate our 9th Anniversary!

event.name: Halloween Trick or...
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Red Feather Valley! Will there be a spooky trick or treat ending?

event.name: ... Halloween Treat!
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Red Feather Valley! It promises better treats to go with the trick!

event.name: Valentine Event Node
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Skyhaven Assault!

event.name: Gladius Scriptorium Consolidation
event.desc: Countdown to the consolidation all the old Classic campaign nodes in Gladius Scriptorium. Get your Mastery Stars before they disappear!

event.name: Skyhaven Assault Consolidation
event.desc: Countdown to the consolidation all the old Classic campaign nodes in Skyhaven Assault. Get your Mastery Stars before they disappear!

event.name: Red Feather Valley Consolidation
event.desc: Countdown to the consolidation all the old ComDev campaign nodes in Red Feather Valley. Get your Mastery Stars before they disappear!

event.name: Alyel Back in Time
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Conflux Convergence! Go with Alyel back in time.

event.name: Alyel Back in Time
event.desc: A time-limited campaign in Gladius Scriptorium! Go with Alyel back in time.

event.name: Double Bounties Gold!
event.desc: Time for one final push on the last day of the Brawl! Earn double gold rewards from Bounties!

event.name: Attention! Flask Expiration
event.desc: Some old Red Champion Stone Flasks rewarded from past Challenges will expire at the end of this BGE cycle. Check your inventory and use them before they disappear.

event.name: Card Buffs!
event.desc: A number of cards have had their stats increased! You can use the Resummon feature to get them back at a discounted price for a limited time! Visit the Spellstone subreddit for more information!

event.name: Dragon Reward Box
event.desc: Use Arena Coins to pull a random ^c0DFFDual Epic^cFFFF Dragon card from Reward Set or an Arena Trophy! Each pull also grants ^cE7FFRasako Stones^cFFFF!

event.name: Avian Reward Box
event.desc: Use Arena Coins to pull a random ^c0DFFDual Epic^cFFFF Avian card from Reward Set or an Arena Trophy! Each pull also grants ^cE7FFMawu Stones^cFFFF!
